    • Class MainMenuPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • easy

          javax.swing.JButton easy
          Starts a game in "easy mode".

        • medium

          javax.swing.JButton medium
          Starts a game in "medium mode".

        • hard

          javax.swing.JButton hard
          Starts a game in "hard mode".

        • loadGame

          javax.swing.JButton loadGame
          Loads the game stored in the progress file if possible.

    • Class ScarletGemMain extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • currentCountry

          Country currentCountry
          Holds the country that the user is currently in. This value will be reassigned to a new value every time the user completes a level.

        • difficulty

          int difficulty
          Holds the number representing the difficulty chosen by the user at the start of the game. 0 represents easy. 1 represents medium and 2 represents hard.

        • levelsRemaining

          int levelsRemaining
          Holds the number of levels that the user has left. In easy mode, this is initialized to 3. In medium mode, this is initialized to 6. In hard mode, this is initialized to 9. When difficulty reaches 0, the game ends. It is initialized to -1 in order to check whether the user started the game or not.

        • timeRemaining

          int timeRemaining
          Holds the time remaining in the game, in seconds. This value will be regularly decremented throughout the game, and displayed at the top of the game screen. When this value reaches 0, the game will end.

        • paused

          boolean paused
          Flag which will determine if the game is "paused". The can be changed by pressing the pause button at the top of each game screen.

        • alreadyBeen

          java.util.ArrayList<E> alreadyBeen
          Holds the instances of each country that the player visited. This makes sure that the player will not visit the same country twice.

        • gamePanel

          GamePanel gamePanel
          Holds the instance of the GamePanel class. This is initialized only once per game, and contains the buttons and menus used in the game.

        • levelCounter

          javax.swing.JLabel levelCounter
          Displays the number of levels that the user still has to complete in order to win the game. Will be refreshed every time the user travels to a new country.

        • mainMenuPanel

          MainMenuPanel mainMenuPanel
          Holds the instance of the MainMenuPanel, which contains the buttons at the start of the game. This is only initialized once, and reappears every time the user completes a level.

        • highScoresViewer

          HighScoresViewer highScoresViewer
          Holds the instance of the HighScoresViewer which the user can see at any time using the menu option or by pressing Ctrl+E. This is only initialized once.

        • instructionsViewer

          InstructionsViewer instructionsViewer
          Holds the instance of the InstructionsViewer which the user can see at any time using the menu option or by pressing Ctrl+R. This is only initialized once.

        • gameTimer

          GameTimer gameTimer
          Holds the instance of the GameTimer class, which is used to time the game.

        • currentQuestion

          int currentQuestion
          Holds the number 1 or 0, depending on which question the user is currently on.

        • howToPlayItem

          javax.swing.JMenuItem howToPlayItem
          Opens the Instructions viewer when the user selects this menu choice.

        • printItem

          javax.swing.JMenuItem printItem
          Opens the Print dialog when the user selects this menu choice.

        • saveItem

          javax.swing.JMenuItem saveItem
          Saves the user's progress when the user selects this menu choice.

        • exitItem

          javax.swing.JMenuItem exitItem
          Closes the game window when the user selects this menu choice.

        • highScoresItem

          javax.swing.JMenuItem highScoresItem
          Opens the High Scores viewer when the user selects this menu choice.

        • helpItem

          javax.swing.JMenuItem helpItem
          Opens the .chm help file when the user selects this menu choice.

        • aboutItem

          javax.swing.JMenuItem aboutItem
          Opens the About dialog when the user selects this menu choice.
